ruleset.name: A7 - Insecure Cryptographic Storage
ruleset.description:
This file is part of the GDS PMD Secure Coding Ruleset.
This ruleset contains rules that are intended to detect Insecure Cryptographic Storage weaknesses.

rule.name: InsecureCryptographicAlgorithm
rule.description: This rule is intended to identify instances of weak cryptographic algorithms. Violations should be manually reviewed and in most cases the algorithm should be replaced with a stronger alternative. Additional algorithms should be added for increased coverage.
